00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <stdlib.h>
00037 #include <unistd.h>
00038 #include <string.h>
00039 #include <time.h>
00040 #include <math.h>
00041 #include <sys/time.h>
00042 #include <sys/types.h>
00043 #include <sys/stat.h>
00044 #include <fcntl.h>
00045
00046 #include "tuple.h"
00047
00048 #define PARALLEL 4
00049 
00050 #define N  8 * 1024
00051 
00056 int
00057 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00058 {
00059         struct tuple *s, *t, *u;
00060         int i, j, iters = 0;
00061         int r1[PARALLEL], r2[PARALLEL], r3[PARALLEL];
00062         double x[N], y[N], mult;
00063         struct timeval T0, T1;
00064         int rndsock;
00065         struct context ctx;
00066
00067         if (get_server_portnumber(&ctx)) {
00068                 if (argc < 3) {
00069                         /* help message */
00070                         fprintf(stderr,
00071                                 "Usage: %s <server> <portnumber>\n", argv[0]);
00072                         exit(1);
00073                 }
00074                 strcpy(ctx.peername, argv[1]);
00075                 ctx.portnumber = atoi(argv[2]);
00076         }
00077
00078         rndsock = open("/dev/urandom", O_RDONLY);
00079         mult = 1.0 / pow(2.0, 31);
00080         for (i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00081                 x[i] = mult * random_int();
00082                 y[i] = mult * random_int();
00083         }
00084
00085         s = make_tuple("siiis#s#", "fft",
00086                        0, 0, 0, x, N * sizeof(double), y, N * sizeof(double));
00087
00088         t = make_tuple("siii??", "fft done", 0, 0, 0);
00089
00090         gettimeofday(&T0, NULL);
00091
00092         while (1) {
00093
00094                 for (j = 0; j < PARALLEL; j++) {
00095                         r1[j] = random_int();
00096                         r2[j] = random_int();
00097                         r3[j] = random_int();
00098                         s->elements[1].data.i = r1[j];
00099                         s->elements[2].data.i = r2[j];
00100                         s->elements[3].data.i = r3[j];
00101                         if (put_tuple(s, &ctx)) {
00102                                 perror("put_tuple failed");
00103                                 exit(1);
00104                         }
00105                 }
00106
00107                 for (j = 0; j < PARALLEL; j++) {
00108                         t->elements[1].data.i = r1[j];
00109                         t->elements[2].data.i = r2[j];
00110                         t->elements[3].data.i = r3[j];
00111                         u = get_tuple(t, &ctx);
00112                         if (u == NULL) {
00113                                 perror("get_tuple failed");
00114                                 exit(1);
00115                         }
00116                 }
00117
00118                 gettimeofday(&T1, NULL);
00119                 iters += PARALLEL;
00120                 printf("%f\n", TIMEVAL_DIFF(T0, T1) / iters);
00121         }
00122
00123         close(rndsock);
00124         destroy_tuple(s);
00125         destroy_tuple(t);
00126         destroy_tuple(u);
00127
00128         return 0;
00129 }
